thread.title: Evidence of metal fatigue in deadly plane engine explosion

title: Evidence of metal fatigue in deadly plane engine explosion
text:
Evidence of metal fatigue in deadly plane engine explosion 3:25pm IST - 01:22 
An engine on a Southwest Airlines flight with 149 people aboard explodes and breaks apart in mid-air, killing one passenger and nearly sucking another out of a shattered window. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An engine on a Southwest Airlines flight with 149 people aboard explodes and breaks apart in mid-air, killing one passenger and nearly sucking another out of a shattered window. No reporter narration. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JUCY9O
